OrgName: Great Place to Work Institute, Inc.
activities:
Great Place provides workplace culture consulting and leadership training services to businesses, non-profits, and government agencies in 45 countries on six continents.  Great Place collects personal information through its consulting and training activities and from survey instruments.

Through these various activities, Great Place processes certain data covered by the Safe Harbor Frameworks, specifically personal data relating to clients, event attendees, and survey and focus group participants.  The covered data includes manually-processed data. 

Great Place does not plan to cover human resources data by the Safe Harbor.

Great Place does transfer data received under the Safe Harbor framework to third parties, including third-party hosting providers and affiliates.  When doing so, Great Place adheres to the Onward Transfer principle.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: clients, event attendees, and survey and focus group participants, The covered data includes manually-processed data.
privacyprograms: Great Place is not currently a member of any privacy programs for Safe Harbor purposes.
recoursemech: The independent recourse mechanism relating to data protection is non-binding mediation including but not limited to JAMS.
